Literature.Title: Design, synthesis, and evaluation of the self-assembled antimicrobial peptides based on the ovalbumin-derived peptide TK913.
Literature.Author: Tan A, Xu F, Yokoyama C, Yano S, Konno H

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus epidermidis NBRC 12993(MIC=25µg/ml),Micrococcus luteus NBRC 3333(MIC=25µg/ml),Escherichia coli NBRC 3972(MIC=400µg/ml),Aspergillus oryzae NBRC 100959(MIC=400µg/ml),Saccharomyces cerevisiae(MIC=400µg/ml),Human cervical carcinoma HeLa(90-100% Cytotoxicity=50µM)
